EmailTemplate.subject: Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
******************************************************************* Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description}
Hello,
In the past, you have tried to import product options with a value of "0" or "00" via a CSV file. For example, a piece of clothing with a size of "0" or "00". Unfortunately, at that time, you received a "bad data" message from the control panel. Instead, you had to create and update these values manually.
We are please to inform you that you are able to import product options with "0" values using a CSV file now. This will make it easier for you to update inventory for existing "0" sizes. You will also be able to create "0" size product options from a CSV.
Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have further questions. Technical support is available 24/7:
https://support.bigcommerce.com/contact.php
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com
You can reply to this email or to view your case's status you can go to https://bigcommerce-community.force.com/Client/bcslogin .
Please do not remove: {!Case.E2CP__Case_Thread_Id__c}
